Position Objective:

As Solution Architect (SA), you will be responsible and accountable for bridging the gap between business problems and technology solutions. Finding the best tech solution among all possible to solve the existing business problems. Describing the structure, characteristics, behaviour, and other aspects of software to project stakeholders. Defining features, phases, and solution requirements. Providing specifications according to which the solution is defined, managed, and delivered.

You will lead and provide the detail and end-to-end solution design for Business case, Project, Change Request (CR), Operation fixes and Strategic Fixes to ensure solution designs are addressing and aligned with business or technical user requirements. In providing architecture assurance that is aligned with the target blueprint architecture, roadmap and standards. What you produce will be used as a reference for development and operational team.

Roles and Responsibilities:

·      Based on Azure Cloud to provide solution planning and architecture design, build competitive solutions, help the main customer on the cloud, and use cloud computing technology to help the customer business development. Provide high level solution design (HLD) to address end-to-end technical requirement which align to business requirement with high level information in the related TBP section for further development of low-level design (LLD) reference by development team.

  • Understand customer business, insight into industry trends, be able to analyze the core demands of public cloud from industry development, understand and grasp customer needs, and have the innovation ability of public cloud industry solutions

·      Lead and translates business requirement into technical requirement to ensure accuracy and quality of solution are covered on all aspects of the business and technical requirements.

·      Owning the ARB process and leading the team to produce the required architectural and solution design diagrams to address business case approval and end-to-end development requirement which align to high level design requirement in related TBP and ADR section for development and testing reference.

·      Identify, present and demonstrate innovation and emerging information technology systems and applications to Technology Council and Community.

·      Provide input to the strategic direction of technology investments to assist in the development of the enterprise architecture and maximize the return on technology investment.

·      Within the agreed enterprise architecture, define and design technology solutions to assist the business in meeting their business objectives.

Participate in meetings to obtain the work group perspective and share information. Resolve and provide solutions to issues and develop the necessary technical designs and artefacts.

Job Requirement

· At least 8 years’ experience in large-scale distributed software development and architecture design is preferred and 3 years' working experience in Azure Cloud architecture

·    Have 10 million level cloud platform architecture design and development experience, proficient in Java/.Net programming; Proficient in design patterns, Refactor project, performance tuning.

·   Familiar with Dynamics 365 online, rich experience architecture design, implementation, performance tuning.

·  Familiar with Devops, Docker container technology and Service Mesh technology;

·  Familiar with and proficient in Redis, Kafka, Solr/ES, MQ and other open source components;

·    Familiar with MSSQL or Oracle or Azure Cloud database;

·    Relevant experience in micro-service system design (based on Dubbo or Spring Cloud, etc.), development, operation and maintenance.

·  Limited experience in leading the digital transformation of large enterprises, IT architecture planning, development and implementation, data integration, etc

• Contribute to overall architecture planning and roadmap 
  • Working closely with business to identify and mitigate existing business risk or risks associated with solution architecture.
  • Validate the proposed architecture building prototypes.
  • Manage the balance between tactical needs and longer-term architectural strategy
  • To articulate the cost and benefits of particular solutions and being able to translate technology into business language and value.
  • Work closely with Business Analyst, Project Management, Business Owners and the development stakeholders and quality to provide the input to drive the right roadmap mix of technology enhancements, strategic improvements and business features to maximize revenue
  • Responsible for designing and building system architectures that are highly scalable, available, resilient, secured and cost optimized.
  • Design and implement solutions based on architectural best practice, technology standards and relevant policies, procedures and frameworks.
  • Able to develop migration strategy, roadmap and implementation plan
  • Understands performance, operations, delivery and infrastructure architecture, to influence a design that reflects all
